name: CAT BOMB
description:
Cat has swallowed a bomb & has been confined in the dungeon!

A Gameboy nouvelle classic created for the #gbjam3

**Hey, listen!** The game is loading even if no loading screen is shown. I knew I was forgetting something!

Please, imagine your Game Boy system as follows:

  • Arrow keys as the D-PAD: Use them to move Cat
  • Enter as Start: Pause the game, confirm in menus, skip scenes
  • A Key is A button: Comfirm in pause menu
  • S Key is B button: Pick & drop bombs & keys

Please note the game has no sound (maybe blowing in the cart will make it work again, who knows!)
